featured.text: Members can access thousands of listings for apartments, villas, suburban homes and farms around the world.

definition.zh_def: 別墅：通常位於郊區或度假區的獨立住宅，提供舒適的居住環境和休閒設施。
definition.en_def: Villas: Independent houses typically located in suburban or resort areas, offering comfortable living spaces and recreational facilities.
definition.example: They rented a beautiful villa by the beach for their summer vacation.
